evidence_example.title: demo sim
evidence_example.small_descr: A minimal Demo developd in collaboration with Lauterbach and Windriver, it runs under Lauterbach simulation environment.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Task demo: A minimal EE demo with the MPC5674F under lauterbach simulation environment The demo uses the following peripherals:
  • LEDs;
  • Buttons;
The demo tests the ECC1 kernel type.
